name: ta-user-governance-tests
description: Comprehensive test suite for TA-user-governance Splunk app

scripts.test:integration: SPLUNK_URL=http://localhost:8000 SPLUNK_USERNAME=admin SPLUNK_PASSWORD=changeme123 npx playwright test integration/ --reporter=list
scripts.test:smoke: SPLUNK_URL=http://localhost:8000 SPLUNK_USERNAME=admin SPLUNK_PASSWORD=changeme123 npx playwright test smoke/ --reporter=list
scripts.test:visual: SPLUNK_URL=http://localhost:8000 SPLUNK_USERNAME=admin SPLUNK_PASSWORD=changeme123 npx playwright test visual/ --reporter=list
scripts.test:e2e: SPLUNK_URL=http://localhost:8000 SPLUNK_USERNAME=admin SPLUNK_PASSWORD=changeme123 npx playwright test e2e/ --reporter=list
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test
scripts.validate: npm run test:unit && echo '✅ Unit tests passed'
scripts.validate:quick: npm run test:unit && npm run test:smoke
scripts.validate:full: npm run test:unit && npm run test:api && npm run test:smoke && npm run test:e2e && echo '✅ Full validation passed'
scripts.pre-pr:
echo '
========================================' && echo '  PRE-PR COMPREHENSIVE TEST SUITE' && echo '========================================
' && npm run test:unit && echo '
✅ Unit tests passed
' && npm run test:api && echo '
✅ API tests passed
' && npm run test:smoke && echo '
✅ Smoke tests passed
' && npm run test:visual && echo '
✅ Visual tests passed
' && npm run test:e2e && echo '
✅ E2E tests passed
' && echo '
========================================' && echo '  ✅ ALL PRE-PR TESTS PASSED' && echo '  READY FOR PULL REQUEST' && echo '========================================
'
scripts.full-test: echo '=== FULL PRE-PR TEST SUITE ===' && npm run test:unit && echo '' && echo '=== CORE FUNCTIONALITY TESTS ===' && SPLUNK_URL=http://localhost:8000 SPLUNK_USERNAME=admin SPLUNK_PASSWORD=changeme123 npx playwright test extend-trace.spec.js visual-indicator-persistence.spec.js negative-extension.spec.js flag-persistence-regression.spec.js --reporter=list && echo '' && echo '=== VISUAL REGRESSION SCREENSHOTS ===' && SPLUNK_URL=http://localhost:8000 SPLUNK_USERNAME=admin SPLUNK_PASSWORD=changeme123 npx playwright test pre-pr-validation.spec.js --reporter=list && echo '' && echo '✅ ALL PRE-PR TESTS PASSED - READY FOR PULL REQUEST'
scripts.screenshots: SPLUNK_URL=http://localhost:8000 SPLUNK_USERNAME=admin SPLUNK_PASSWORD=changeme123 npx playwright test pre-pr-validation.spec.js --reporter=list
scripts.screenshots:all: SPLUNK_URL=http://localhost:8000 SPLUNK_USERNAME=admin SPLUNK_PASSWORD=changeme123 npx playwright test visual/ e2e/ --reporter=list
scripts.clean: rm -rf test-results screenshots/pre-pr-* screenshots/e2e-workflow visual/current visual/diff coverage test-reports
scripts.start-splunk: docker start splunk-dev && echo 'Waiting for Splunk...' && sleep 30
scripts.restart-splunk: npm run stop-splunk && npm run start-splunk

author: DataDay Technology Solutions
